'''Peter Chuklev''' (born [[1936]]) is a Bulgarian illustrator. Graduated from the Art Academy in Sofia in 1960, he has been a teacher at the National Art Academy since 1964 and professor of printmaking since 1993.<ref>[http://www.lessedra.com/japan-project/petar%20Chuklev.htm Profile on Lessedra Art Gallery], as of June 5, 2010.</ref> 

Working primarily in the area of printmaking, illustration, and drawing, Chuklev made the illustrations for the 1979 version of the 1975 Bulgarian edition of ''[[The Hobbit]]''.<ref>''[[The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition]]''</ref>
